participant_1.background:
I met my best friend in kindergarten.
I am of the jewish faith.
I grew up in north dakota.
I got a job working in advertising last year.
I have traveled and studied abroad.

participant_2.background:
I have two dogs and one cat.
I work as a nurses aide in a nursing home.
I love to ride my bike.
I love caring for people.

content.text: Hi! What do you do for work?
I work as a nurses aide in a nursing home.
Oh, that's nice! I'm a bit of a hypochondriac, so I'm always looking for people in the medical field to talk to.
Yeah, I love my job. It's really rewarding to help people.
I'm sure it is. I have a lot of respect for people in the medical field.
Thanks! What do you do for fun?
I like to travel and study abroad. I've been to a lot of different countries.
Wow, that sounds amazing! I've always wanted to travel, but I just haven't had the chance.
You should! It's so much fun to experience new cultures and meet new people.
I'll definitely keep that in mind. Do you have any pets?
I have two dogs and one cat. They're my best friends.
That's awesome! I love animals. I have two dogs and one cat too.
That's so cool! We should get together sometime and let our pets play together.
That sounds like a great idea! I'm free this weekend if you are.
This weekend works for me. Let's exchange numbers and we can figure out the details.
